languages.text: "Этот бой — весьма занятный артефакт вашей культуры".

traits.locale_text: "Этот бой — весьма занятный артефакт вашей культуры, Кибелла".

languages.text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."
languages.original_text: "Этот бой — весьма занятный артефакт вашей культуры".

traits.locale_text: "This is a fascinating phenomenon. The weavers' culture is curious indeed."
"This is a fascinating phenomenon. The weavers' culture is curious indeed."
"This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."
"This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."
"This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."
"This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

languages.text: «Este combate... Qué expresión tan cautivadora de su cultura».
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

traits.locale_text: «Este combate... Qué expresión tan cautivadora de su cultura».

languages.text: 「この戦いは実に魅力的におまえの文化を表現しているな」
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

traits.locale_text: 「この戦いは実に魅力的におまえの文化を表現しているな」

languages.text: “刚刚的战斗很畅快，你们的文化表现形式很迷人。”
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

traits.locale_text: “刚刚的战斗很畅快，你们的文化表现形式很迷人。”

languages.text: "Dieser Kampf – was für eine spannendes Abbild Eurer Kultur."
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Kampf – was für eine spannendes Abbild Eurer Kultur."

languages.text: « Quel combat ! Voilà une manifestation captivante de votre culture. »
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."

traits.locale_text: « Quel combat ! Voilà une manifestation captivante de votre culture. »

languages.text: "Bu kavga... Kültürünün ne kadar da büyüleyici bir dışa vurumu."
languages.original_text: "This fight — what a captivating expression of your culture."
